title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results are not being selected in an external jar. This issue is observed in Build 200201151. When searching for references to a specific field, the results are not being selected properly.
OB: When searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the 'java.io.File' class, the search results are not being selected properly.
EB: When searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the 'java.io.File' class, the search results should be selected properly.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:

1. Ensure that JDK1.3.1 is set as the default JRE.
2. Make sure you have the source for rt.jar.
3. Open the 'java.io.File' class in the IDE.
4. Search for references to the 'tmpFir' field.
5. Verify that the search results are not being selected properly.
